plot: The acclaimed pianist performs several pieces in concert at the invitation of Prince Charles. The intermission features a 25-minute documentary on Horowitz's life and career.
title: Horowitz in London: A Royal Concert
plot_es: The acclaimed pianist performs several pieces in concert at the invitation of Prince Charles. The intermission features a 25-minute documentary on Horowitz's life and career.
original_name: Horowitz in London: A Royal Concert
plot_en: The acclaimed pianist performs several pieces in concert at the invitation of Prince Charles. The intermission features a 25-minute documentary on Horowitz's life and career.
